item.title: HTB Pilgrimage
item.description: Introduction # Pilgrimage is a machine by HackTheBox created by user coopertim13.

item.title: Haystack
item.description: JWT Token Forgery for Haystack’s Annotator Tool (CVE-2023-1712) # Introduction # The purpose of this disclosure is to ethically report a web vulnerability found in the Annotator Tool.
